item.title: Introduce
item.description: 資料庫種類 RDBMS: Relational Database Management System NoSQL: No Only SQL RDBMS ACID A = Atomicity: Each transaction be “all or nothing” 轉帳，要不就成功，失敗也不會有任何問題 C = Consistency: Any transaction will
